Html:
Hi,

I am new to healthcare billing and would like to know if i can rely on x12 parser to generate institutional claims (837i)? I am planning to generate XML structure from my healthcare application and then use x12 parser to generate 837i to send it to clearinghouse. Am i on right track?

 

Best Regards,

 

Rohan

Yes, you can use this for that.  There is some discussion about that here: http://x12parser.codeplex.com/discussions/265463

The other use had given me quite a bit of feedback to make sure the x12 parser would work for the 5010 versions of the 837, so you won't be the first to use it for this purpose.

Hi,


Please provide a sample code to generate 837 P EDI fro 5010

Hi,

Very good morning,

have any one have 837 creation in C#

thanks & regards,
karthikc

Hi,
I am in development of 837 Institutional using OopFactory X12.I am using 3.08 version of this.How to use SV2 - INSTITUTIONAL SERVICE LINE(LOOP 2400 — SERVICE LINE NUMBER) and CL1 Institutional Claim Code (LOOP 2300— CLAIM INFORMATION)
Please help me how to add above loops in my code using oopfactory x12
Thanks in advance
